commentaries.title: M29: RCB vs RR – AB de Villiers Six
M29: RCB vs RR – Dinesh Karthik Six

commentaries.bbcode: This match may be on the turn as AB has just been dismissed. It will be interesting to see who takes the upper hand after this Timeout. The birthday boy Faulkner is back on with the ball

message.text: This match may be on the turn as AB has just been dismissed. It will be interesting to see who takes the upper hand after this Timeout. The birthday boy Faulkner is back on with the ball

commentaries.bbcode: J Faulkner to S Khan, %SPEED% good length just outside off stump. He picks up a single
commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to S Khan, %SPEED% good length just outside off stump. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: J Faulkner to D Karthik, no run, %SPEED% good length outside off stump. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to D Karthik, no run, %SPEED% good length outside off stump. He plays and misses

commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to D Karthik, Wide delivery

commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to D Karthik, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: J Faulkner to S Khan, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to S Khan, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Sarfaraz Khan backs away to leg and plays a cheeky uppercut fine on the off side

message.text: Four! Sarfaraz Khan backs away to leg and plays a cheeky uppercut fine on the off side

commentaries.bbcode: J Faulkner to S Khan, %SPEED% good length outside off stump. He picks up a single
commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to S Khan, %SPEED% good length outside off stump. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: J Faulkner to D Karthik, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to D Karthik, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Faulkner goes short and Karthik launches himself into a pull shot that takes off past mid wicket. There was no catching that!

message.text: Four! Faulkner goes short and Karthik launches himself into a pull shot that takes off past mid wicket. There was no catching that!

commentaries.bbcode: S Watson to S Khan, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: S Watson to S Khan, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Sarfaraz plants on the front foot, slashes a drive over point and it spins past the chasing third man

message.text: Four! Sarfaraz plants on the front foot, slashes a drive over point and it spins past the chasing third man

commentaries.bbcode: S Watson to S Khan, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: S Watson to S Khan, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Watson looks confused! Khan uses finesse this time and glides the ball over the keeper and to the fence

message.text: Four! Watson looks confused! Khan uses finesse this time and glides the ball over the keeper and to the fence

commentaries.bbcode: S Watson to S Khan, [b]WICKET!!! D Karthik is out[/b] run out (Tim Southee)
commentaries.autoText: S Watson to S Khan, WICKET!!! D Karthik is out run out (Tim Southee)

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket! [/b]Whipped away onto the leg side, Karthik turned around and wanted the second run that wasn't there, he was sent back by Sarfaraz and another accurate throw from RR gets them another stolen wicket.

message.text: Wicket! Whipped away onto the leg side, Karthik turned around and wanted the second run that wasn't there, he was sent back by Sarfaraz and another accurate throw from RR gets them another stolen wicket.

commentaries.bbcode: Watson calls upon the experience of Tambe late on here

message.text: Watson calls upon the experience of Tambe late on here

commentaries.bbcode: P Tambe to S Khan, %SPEED% short length on leg stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: P Tambe to S Khan, %SPEED% short length on leg stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Khan grabs the momentum with a predetermined sweep shot and executes it perfectly

message.text: Four! Khan grabs the momentum with a predetermined sweep shot and executes it perfectly

commentaries.bbcode: P Tambe to S Khan, %SPEED% good length on middle stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: P Tambe to S Khan, %SPEED% good length on middle stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six![/b] The youngster is playing with no fear and skips down the wicket, punishing the ball way back over deep long off. He is certainly one to watch!

message.text: Six! The youngster is playing with no fear and skips down the wicket, punishing the ball way back over deep long off. He is certainly one to watch!

commentaries.autoText: P Tambe to S Khan, %SPEED% good length just outside off stump. He picks up a single

commentaries.autoText: P Tambe to S Khan, %SPEED% good length on leg stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Southee makes a desperate dive at deep long off but Sarfaraz serves up another bold drive over the infield

message.text: Four! Southee makes a desperate dive at deep long off but Sarfaraz serves up another bold drive over the infield

commentaries.bbcode: Kulkarni comes into the attack under huge pressure

commentaries.autoText: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, Wide delivery

commentaries.bbcode: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, %SPEED% full length on middle stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, %SPEED% full length on middle stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Wiese uses his long leavers to whack a straight drive back past the bowler and increase the pressure once more

message.text: Four! Wiese uses his long leavers to whack a straight drive back past the bowler and increase the pressure once more

commentaries.bbcode: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, no run, %SPEED% full toss outside off stump. He doesn't offer a shot
commentaries.autoText: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, no run, %SPEED% full toss outside off stump. He doesn't offer a shot

commentaries.bbcode: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Sliced away past third man! This has the potential to be another huge over for the home side. Watson comes to chat to his bowler...

message.text: Four! Sliced away past third man! This has the potential to be another huge over for the home side. Watson comes to chat to his bowler...

commentaries.bbcode: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, no run, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, no run, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, [b]WICKET!!! D Wiese is out[/b] c Tim Southee b Dhawal Kulkarni
commentaries.autoText: D Kulkarni to D Wiese, WICKET!!! D Wiese is out c Tim Southee b Dhawal Kulkarni

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] Wiese didn't get a hold of the slower delivery and his delayed pull shot picks out Southee in the deep. In comes Harshal Patel...

message.text: Wicket! Wiese didn't get a hold of the slower delivery and his delayed pull shot picks out Southee in the deep. In comes Harshal Patel...

commentaries.bbcode: D Kulkarni to S Khan, %SPEED% full toss on off stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: D Kulkarni to S Khan, %SPEED% full toss on off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Extraordinary! Sarfaraz decides to get low and paddle the ball fine right off his nose, what a brave shot from the youngster!

message.text: Four! Extraordinary! Sarfaraz decides to get low and paddle the ball fine right off his nose, what a brave shot from the youngster!

commentaries.bbcode: T Southee to H Patel, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: T Southee to H Patel, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six![/b] What a way to start the final over! Patel backs into his crease and slaps the ball into the clouds and into the stands over wide mid on

message.text: Six! What a way to start the final over! Patel backs into his crease and slaps the ball into the clouds and into the stands over wide mid on

commentaries.bbcode: T Southee to H Patel, 1 bye
